review: So great! I love the fire tv stick and am so happy with it I bought another tv stick and several full fire tv units as holiday gifts. The system is really easy to use, streams very fast and smooth (better than my apple tv and roku units). I only wish the remote had light-up buttons for watching tv in a very dark room--I might put some glow in the dark tape on it and see if that helps visibility on the remote itself.

review: I jumped on this when the price dropped to $19 for Prime members. I already had a chromecast so it was more out of curiosity for a tech fan. It works just as well as the chromecast and the remote is a great addition, but sometimes it seems a bit touchy. I've set it down, face down, and it turned off the movie and went to the main menu. Just a minor issue. A more prominent issue is the connection to wifi. If my chromecast had the same problem, I'd accept it's my brand new router. But it doesn't. The Fire TV Stick occasionally goes into a boot loop of sorts. For instance, I had to go back to my chromecast because the Stick wouldn't stay connected. It doesn't happen all of the time, but more than I would like.  Other than that, it's a great piece of tech at even $39, it's worth it. It's nice to have such a small product that doesn't take up any space do so much. I highly recommend it. It'll be 5 stars when the connection issue is fixed.
